title: Conselho Tutelar
resume: Sereno and César fight with all our strength to rescue the girl of the aggressor's arms. Finally, Vera was arrested and the girl sent to a foster home + Learn the song displayed in vignette Guardian Council + César Sereno and investigate the case of girl abused by family + See shocking images of child abuse scenes displayed on Child Protection Agency
